roleset.name: make global, bring to the whole globe
roleset.note: GLOBALIZE-V NOTES: Frame created by Jena. (from globalize.01-v)
GLOBALIZATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, 'globalize-v.01'. No VNcls. (from globalization.01-n)

example.name: globalize-v: transitive
example.text: The system has globalized the ways in which production is performed on our planet.
example.arg: the ways in which production is performed on our planet

example.name: globalization-n: both args
example.text: The company claims that since their globalization of the neem seed the price has risen which initially helps the farmers.

roleset.name: reaching areas all over the world
roleset.note: GLOBAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-earthquakes.

example.name: global-j
example.text: While the Unzen eruptions have caused deaths and considerable local damage , the impact of the June 1991 eruption of Mount Pinatubo was global .
example.arg: While the Unzen eruptions have caused deaths and considerable local damage
the impact of the June 1991 eruption of Mount Pinatubo
